body:
Comment 3 by **thomasrling**: 
On Slackware64-14.1 using go1.2 I was having this error with both the source and
official binary downloads when installing to a $GOROOT somewhere in my home directory.

I "resolved" the problem by installing to /usr/local/go/ and unsetting my GOROOT env
variable. After this, running "godoc -http=:6060" worked as expected.

This worked with both the source and binary downloads.
